title: Community Van Driver
description: Provide safe transportation and support for community residents, typically seniors, by driving them to appointments, assisting with mobility needs, and helping ensure a positive experience during outings.
source_excerpt: a role focused on providing transportation and support to residents, typically seniors, in a community setting like an assisted living facility or through a local volunteer program. Key duties include safely transporting residents to appointments, assisting them with mobility aids, planning routes, and assisting with other activities, all while ensuring a positive and fulfilling experience for the residents. The role often requires a valid driver's license and may involve a variety of vehicles, sometimes including a non-CDL bus
